data.actual_result: The DM does not send, and when you go back to Discord you will not see the message sent from yourself
data.expected_result: They should receive the DM and you should see that you sent it in the app
data.short_description: Replying to a DM via the inline notification results in your reply not being sent (HAVE NOTIFICATIONS ON) (May take several tries, try at least 5-10 times)
data.steps_to_repro: - Have someone DM you, whether it be image or text - Close Discord before they DM you - Let the inline notification disappear from your screen - Go to Notification center (swipe down for me) - Expand Notification and hit "Reply" - Send them a DM and ask if they received it - Observe
